title: Mail Boss 7128, White 27" Surface Mount Mailbox Post for Sidewalk and Street curbside Installation
features: Post made of heavy-duty 10- and 14-gauge electrogalvanized steel
Used with Base Plate for mounting onto 4-8" sidewalk or curb
Includes 4 mounting bolts and clear instructions
Mail Boss mailbox and Base Plate not included
description: Use this 27" Surface Mount Post with a Base Plate (not included) for securely mounting any Mail Boss mailbox on a 4"-8" sidewalk or curb (above the road surface). This 27" heavy-duty steel post is made of 10-gauge and 14-gauge galvanized steel with a durable powder-coated finish.
